casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joshua James GOFF 377P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Joshua James Goff, for Goff, Joshua James.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of October 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
